comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Colin Bell (The Moree Mountain) was born in Narrabri, Australia on the 6th October 1883. The same place of birth as the three times World heavyweight title challenger Bill Squires. Standing at 510 tall and weighing in around 190lb, Bell would have to be one of the most underrated of all Australian heavyweights." boxrec.com/media/index.php?title=Human:40048
